name: Hentai In The Forest
description:
Hentai In The Forest is a Survival game in an open world full of dangers, interesting places and valuable resources. Explore this amazing world, build shelters, hunt wild animals, fish, find or create equipment and weapons, cook food and monitor the characteristics of your character. How long can you survive in the forest?

Somewhere here are hidden ten drawings of beautiful girls, find them to complete the game.

Main Features


  • Open world
  • Lots of weapons and equipment
  • Search for resources
  • Crafting
  • Construction
  • Cooking food
  • Hentai drawings!
  • And much more!
